snippet.title: Pop'n Tanks! Gameplay Story Mode (PlayStation,PS1,PSX)
snippet.description:
Pop'n Tanks! is a tank combat game that strives for the comic rather than the realistic. The players pilot a mini-tank across a 3D terrain, crushing barricades and shelling other tanks. This game developed and published by Enix Corporation, which was released Japan in July 29, 1999.

Player: MfaRec
Platform: PlayStation
Release Date: July 29, 1999
